Title: Delver's Call: The Skittering Breach
Description:
Call For Any Who Can Swing a Sword or Sling a Spell!

The nerubians perform foul rituals in the shadow of our once beautiful Aegis Wall. Word is that a dark temple dedicated to their cursed gods rests beneath the ground. 

Someone must investigate this foul place and put an end to their schemes.
ObjectivesText: Complete the Skittering Breach delve on any difficulty.
ObjectivesCompletionText: Return to Lerrenai Fayn in Dunelle's Kindness
RewardText:
You survived the Skittering Breach? I know many a Lamplighter who was forced to retreat from that foul place.

You've made this land safer. Thank you.

Objectives.Text: Skittering Breach delve completed on any difficulty
